text.value: Has the patient been diagnosed with chronic migraines?
Has the patient tried other preventive migraine treatments?
Please list previous medications used for migraine prevention.
What is the frequency of migraines per month?
Has the patient experienced side effects or lack of effectiveness with prior treatments?
Does the patient have any contraindications to other migraine medications?
Does the patient have insurance coverage for Aimovig?
